entry.title: Re some wallets like @AmbireWallet already have a token and started liquidity mining programs to fast track user acquisition
entry.summary: Re some wallets like @AmbireWallet already have a token and started liquidity mining programs to fast track user acquisition DeFi Airdrops 🦇🔊: Not the classic retroactive airdrop but @AmbireWallet is dropping 7.5% of its $WALLET supply over 1 yr to users for simply holding tokens in their wallet. So e.g if you hold $USDC in your Ambire wallet you get $WALLET dropped everyday. Rn at $50m tvl the apy amounts to 16%

entry.title: $COW token is finally expected to unlock around 3pm UTC today. This will kick off a 12 week $COW liquidity mining program on @ethereum & @gnosis chain...
entry.summary: $COW token is finally expected to unlock around 3pm UTC today. This will kick off a 12 week $COW liquidity mining program on @ethereum & @gnosis chain aginst $ETH and $GNO pairs. On Ethereum $COW pool will be on @BalancerLabs & on gnosis chain it will be on @SwaprEth.

entry.title: Airdrop for $veCRV and $vlCVX holders. Lendflare allows you to borrow against your Curve LP tokens.
entry.summary: Airdrop for $veCRV and $vlCVX holders. Lendflare allows you to borrow against your Curve LP tokens. LendFlare.Finance: 🎁🎁🎁 We would like to express our gratitude towards @CurveFinance and @ConvexFinance teams and communities for your support and help.
